snippet: Denis Mukwege, a gynecologic surgeon who has helped thousands of rape victims, arrived in Congo after more than two months in exile after an assassination attempt.
abstract: Denis Mukwege, gynecological surgeon renowned for repairing insides of thousands of brutally raped women, returns to Democratic Republic of Congo after more than two months in exile, and is hailed as hero by thousands of people; Mukwege left country after nearly being assassinated, possibly for speaking out on behalf of countless women who have been gang-raped by armed groups that stalk hills of eastern Congo.
lead_paragraph: Denis Mukwege, a gynecologic surgeon who has helped thousands of rape victims, arrived in Congo after more than two months in exile after an assassination attempt.

headline.seo: Denis Mukwege, Doctor Who Aids Rape Victims, Returns to Congo
headline.main: Doctor Returns to Congo and Is Hailed as a Hero
headline.print_headline: Doctor Returns to Congo And Is Hailed as a Hero

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
